param.name: player
param.label: Player for this Media
param.description: Choose which media player to use, overrides global settings.

param.name: internal_popup
param.label: Display as popup/New Window
param.description: Choose whether the internal viewer should be a popup or inline. If direct then plays in new window. Affects this file only. Overrides global settings

param.name: playerwidth
param.label: Custom width for internal player or window
param.description: Set a width for the player or direct link that will play in a new window. 300 assumed if nothing added. Affects only this file

param.name: playerheight
param.label: Custom height for internal player or window
param.description: Set a height attribute for the internal player or direct link that will play in a new window. 400 assumed. Only affects this mediafile

param.name: popupmargin
param.label: Height Margin for Popup
param.description: Set space above and below popup for header and footer.

param.name: podcasts
param.label: Select one or more podcasts
param.description: Use Ctrl-click to select more than one item.
